1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json).

1068.issue: [W1068] "common.keywords" should not contain "iobroker, adapter, smart home" [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json)

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.main" is deprecated and ignored. Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json). Executable is defined by entry "main" at [package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/io-package.json).

5018.issue: [E5018] "@alcalzone/release-script" (>=3.0.0) is used, but ".releaseconfig.json" not found. Please create.

6005.issue: [E6005] No actual year found in copyright at [README.md](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/README.md). Please add "Copyright (c) 2025 Newan <info@newan.de>" at start of LICENSE section.

7001.issue: [E7001] No actual year found in LICENSE. Please add "Copyright (c) 2025 Newan <info@newan.de>" at the start of LICENSE

0036.issue: [E0036] @iobroker/testing 2.5.2 specified. 4.1.3 is required as minimum,  5.2.2 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/Newan/ioBroker.aio/blob/master/package.json)
